bill.title: Provides for limitations and prohibitions on the collection and sharing of student information and provides penalties for violations (EN +$651,000 SD EX See Note)
bill.description: Provides for limitations and prohibitions on the collection and sharing of student information and provides penalties for violations (EN +$651,000 SD EX See Note)

history.action: Read by title, substitute title adopted, lies over in the same order of business, substitute for HB No. 946 reported by the Committee on Education (1076).
Read by title, ordered engrossed, passed to 3rd reading.
Read third time by title, amended, roll called on final passage, yeas 99, nays 0. Finally passed, title adopted, ordered to the Senate.
Received in the Senate. Read first time by title and placed on the Calendar for a second reading.
Read second time by title and referred to the Committee on Education.
Reported with amendments. Rules suspended. Committee amendments read and adopted. Read by title and referred to the Legislative Bureau.
Reported with Legislative Bureau amendments which were read and adopted. Read by title and passed to third reading and final passage.
Senate floor amendments read and adopted. Read by title, passed by a vote of 38 yeas and 0 nays, and ordered returned to the House. Motion to reconsider tabled.
Received from the Senate with amendments.
Read by title, roll called, yeas 98, nays 0, Senate amendments concurred in.
Enrolled and signed by the Speaker of the House.
Signed by the President of the Senate on 6/3/2014.
Sent to the Governor for executive approval.
Signed by the Governor. Becomes Act No. 837.
